title: T206 Ty Cobb - Old Mill - PSA 5
author: jviglietta

posts.post_title: T206 Ty Cobb - Old Mill - PSA 5
posts.post_content:
Greetings!  New to the forum (thanks to an eBay user for recommending this great site!).  Selling my collection (daughter going to college in the fall) - "rookie" cards of my top 20 players of all time.  First card I am listing is a T206 Old Mill Ty Cobb.  $5700 or best offer.  Please PM me.  Feel free to PM me as well for other cards (ALL investment grade).  Thanks!

http://i32.photobucket.com/albums/d1/jviglietta/Cobb%20Front_zpsdj3bzxh8.jpg.html[/IMG]
